# NSFontAction.noFontChangeAction

**Case**

No action; the font is returned unchanged.

## Declaration

```swift
case noFontChangeAction
```

## Constants

- **NSFontAction.viaPanelFontAction**: Converts the font according to the `NSFontPanel` method `panelConvertFont:`.
- **NSFontAction.addTraitFontAction**: Converts the font to have an additional trait using [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSFontManager/convert(_:toHaveTrait:)].
- **NSFontAction.sizeUpFontAction**: Converts the font to a larger size using [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSFontManager/convert(_:toSize:)].
- **NSFontAction.sizeDownFontAction**: Converts the font to a smaller size using [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSFontManager/convert(_:toSize:)].
- **NSFontAction.heavierFontAction**: Converts the font to a heavier weight using [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSFontManager/convertWeight(_:of:)].
- **NSFontAction.lighterFontAction**: Converts the font to a lighter weight using [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSFontManager/convertWeight(_:of:)].
- **NSFontAction.removeTraitFontAction**: Converts the font to remove a trait using [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSFontManager/convert(_:toNotHaveTrait:)].
